Summary: Silver object, possible lit in silver,
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Augusta
There were no other sightings in Augusta on or around November 26th 2009
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
divs: sighting detailsafter observing the shuttle\station flyover, 4 other witnesses and i saw a silver round or sphere like object moving quickly across the sky, stopping suddenly, then zipping back the other way. at times it would move in a zig-zag pattern. all people who saw it commented on it. i will have my girlfriend file a report as well. i noticed the object, as did one other as it zipped into view, about 2 mins after the shuttle\space station had passed. the object finally flew out of view, towards the west......... was excited after seeing the object. and was wishing i had had a video camera with me !!!!!!
